trans-unit.source: Makes the form control non-editable. Unlike the disabled attribute, readonly form controls are still included in form submissions and the user can still select (but not edit) their value text.
trans-unit.target: 使表单控件不可编辑。与 disabled 属性不同， readonly 表单控件仍包含在表单提交中，并且用户仍可以选择（但不能编辑）其值文本。

trans-unit.source: Many browsers support the crypto.getRandomValues() method, but not actual cryptography functionality under crypto.subtle.
trans-unit.target: 许多浏览器都支持 crypto.getRandomValues() 方法，而不是实际的下加密功能 crypto.subtle 。

trans-unit.source: Matches elements based on their directionality. :dir(ltr) matches elements which are Left-to-Right. :dir(rtl) matches elements which are Right-to-Left.
trans-unit.target: 根据元素的方向性进行匹配。 :dir(ltr) 匹配从左到右的元素。 :dir(rtl) 匹配从右到左的元素。

trans-unit.source: Meta programming with ECMAScript 6 proxies
trans-unit.target: 使用ECMAScript 6代理进行元编程

trans-unit.source: Meta tag to define a suggested color that browsers should use to customize the display of the page or of the surrounding user interface.
trans-unit.target: 元标签,用于定义浏览器应使用的建议颜色,以自定义页面或周围用户界面的显示。

trans-unit.source: Meta tag to define a suggested color that browsers should use to customize the display of the page or of the surrounding user interface. The meta tag overrides any theme-color set in the web app manifest.
Method for data binding, a now-withdrawn ECMAScript 7 proposal
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定的方法,一个现已被撤销的ECMAScript 7提案。

trans-unit.source: Method for having two-way communication between browsing contexts (using MessageChannel)
trans-unit.target: 在浏览上下文之间进行双向通信的方法(使用MessageChannel)。

trans-unit.source: Method for observing and reacting to changes to sizes of DOM elements.
trans-unit.target: 观察和反应DOM元素大小变化的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method for observing and reacting to changes to the DOM. Replaces MutationEvents, which is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 用于观察和反应DOM变化的方法。取代MutationEvents,后者已被废弃。

trans-unit.source: Method of accessing DOM elements by class name
trans-unit.target: 通过类名访问DOM元素的方法

trans-unit.source: Method of accessing DOM elements using CSS selectors
trans-unit.target: 使用CSS选择器访问DOM元素的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of accessing external device data (such as a webcam video stream). Formerly this was envisioned as the <device> element.
trans-unit.target: 访问外部设备数据（例如网络摄像头视频流）的方法。以前，这被设想为<device>元素。

trans-unit.source: Method of adding pronunciation or other annotations using ruby elements (primarily used in East Asian typography).
trans-unit.target: 使用ruby元素添加发音或其他注释的方法(主要用于东亚的排版)。

trans-unit.source: Method of adjusting the font size in a matter that relates to the height of lowercase vs. uppercase letters. This makes it easier to set the size of fallback fonts.
trans-unit.target: 在涉及到小写字母与大写字母的高度问题上,调整字体大小的方法。这样可以更方便地设置回退字体的大小。

trans-unit.source: Method of alerting the user outside of a web page by displaying notifications (that do not require interaction by the user).
trans-unit.target: 通过显示通知(不需要用户交互)在网页外提醒用户的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of allowing a webpage to handle a given protocol using navigator.registerProtocolHandler. This allows certain URLs to be opened by a given web application, for example mailto: addresses can be opened by a webmail client.
trans-unit.target: 使用 navigator.registerProtocolHandler 允许网页处理给定协议的方法。这允许通过给定的Web应用程序打开某些URL，例如 mailto: 地址可以由Webmail客户端打开。

trans-unit.source: Method of allowing an element to be resized by the user, with options to limit to a given direction.
trans-unit.target: 允许用户调整元素大小的方法,可以选择限制在给定的方向上。

trans-unit.source: Method of allowing calculated values for length units, i.e. width: calc(100% - 3em)
trans-unit.target: 允许使用长度单位（即 width: calc(100% - 3em) 计算值的方法：calc（100％-3em）

trans-unit.source: Method of allowing multiple scripts to communicate with a single web worker.
trans-unit.target: 允许多个脚本与一个web worker通信的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of allowing two users to communicate directly, browser to browser using the RTCPeerConnection API.
trans-unit.target: 允许两个用户直接通信的方法,浏览器与浏览器之间使用RTCPeerConnection API。

trans-unit.source: Method of applying advanced typographic and language-specific font features to supported OpenType fonts.
trans-unit.target: 将先进的排版和特定语言字体功能应用到支持的OpenType字体的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of applying and accessing custom data to elements.
trans-unit.target: 向元素应用和访问自定义数据的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of applying filter effects (like blur, grayscale or hue) to content/elements below the target element.
trans-unit.target: 将滤镜效果(如模糊、灰度或色调)应用到目标元素下方的内容/元素的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of applying filter effects (like blur, grayscale, brightness, contrast and hue) to elements, previously only possible by using SVG.
trans-unit.target: 将滤镜效果(如模糊、灰度、亮度、对比度和色调)应用到元素上的方法,以前只有通过使用SVG才能实现。

trans-unit.source: Method of applying filter effects using the filter property to elements, matching filters available in SVG. Filter functions include blur, brightness, contrast, drop-shadow, grayscale, hue-rotate, invert, opacity, sepia and saturate.
Method of applying one or more shadow or blur effects to text
trans-unit.target: 将一种或多种阴影或模糊效果应用于文本的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of applying styles based on media information. Includes things like page and device dimensions
trans-unit.target: 基于媒体信息应用样式的方法。包括页面和设备尺寸等内容

trans-unit.source: Method of continuously sending data from a server to the browser, rather than repeatedly requesting it (EventSource interface, used to fall under HTML5)
trans-unit.target: 从服务器持续向浏览器发送数据,而不是重复请求数据的方法(EventSource接口,曾经属于HTML5)。

trans-unit.source: Method of controlling number values in generated content, using the counter-reset and counter-increment properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用 counter-reset 和 counter-increment 属性控制生成内容中数字值的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of controlling when words at the end of lines should be hyphenated using the "hyphens" property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 "连字符 "属性控制行末的字何时应该连字符的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of converting JavaScript objects to JSON strings and JSON back to objects using JSON.stringify() and JSON.parse()
trans-unit.target: 使用JSON.stringify()和JSON.parse()将JavaScript对象转换为JSON字符串和JSON返回对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of creating URL handles to the specified File or Blob object.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的文件或Blob对象创建URL句柄的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of creating an enlarged cap, including a drop or raised cap, in a robust way.
trans-unit.target: 以稳健的方式创造一个扩大的盖子,包括一个跌落或凸起的盖子的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of creating, composing, and consuming streams of data, that map efficiently to low-level I/O primitives, and allow easy composition with built-in backpressure and queuing.
trans-unit.target: 创建、合成和消费数据流的方法,这些数据流有效地映射到低级I/O基元,并允许使用内置的背压和队列轻松合成。

trans-unit.source: Method of customizing the width of the tab character. Only effective using 'white-space: pre' or 'white-space: pre-wrap'.
trans-unit.target: 自定义标签字符宽度的方法。仅在使用 "white-space:pre "或 "white-space:pre-wrap "时有效。

trans-unit.source: Method of declaring a portion of reusable markup that is parsed but not rendered until cloned.
trans-unit.target: 声明可重用标记的一部分的方法,该部分标记被解析,但在克隆之前不会被渲染。

trans-unit.source: Method of declaring the outline (stroke) width and color for text.
trans-unit.target: 声明文本的轮廓(笔触)宽度和颜色的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of defining a conical or repeating conical color gradient as a CSS image.
trans-unit.target: 将锥形或重复锥形颜色渐变定义为CSS图像的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of defining a context menu item, now deprecated and removed from the HTML specification.
trans-unit.target: 定义上下文菜单项的方法，现在已弃用并从HTML规范中删除。

trans-unit.source: Method of defining a linear or radial color gradient as a CSS image.
trans-unit.target: 将线性或径向颜色渐变定义为CSS图像的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of defining a repeating linear or radial color gradient as a CSS image.
trans-unit.target: 将重复的线性或径向颜色渐变定义为CSS图像的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of defining how a background image is attached to a scrollable element. Values include scroll (default), fixed and local.
trans-unit.target: 定义如何将背景图像附加到可滚动元素的方法。值包括 scroll （默认）， fixed 和 local 。

trans-unit.source: Method of defining new HTML tags.
trans-unit.target: 定义新的HTML标签的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of defining the effect resulting from overlaying two layers on a Canvas element.
trans-unit.target: 定义在Canvas元素上叠加两个图层产生的效果的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of defining the type, style and color of lines in the text-decoration property. These can be defined as shorthand (e.g. text-decoration: line-through dashed blue) or as single properties (e.g. text-decoration-color: blue)
trans-unit.target: 在text-decoration属性中定义线条的类型，样式和颜色的方法。这些可以定义为简写形式（例如， text-decoration: line-through dashed blue ）或单个属性（例如， text-decoration-color: blue ）

trans-unit.source: Method of defining the visible region of an HTML element using SVG or a shape definition.
trans-unit.target: 使用SVG或形状定义来定义HTML元素的可见区域的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of describing colors using Hue, Saturation and Lightness (hsl()) rather than just RGB, as well as allowing alpha-transparency with rgba() and hsla().
trans-unit.target: 使用色调、饱和度和明度(hsl())来描述颜色的方法,而不仅仅是RGB,还允许使用rgba()和hsla()进行alpha-透明度。

trans-unit.source: Method of displaying SVG images in HTML using <img>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<img>以HTML显示SVG图像的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of displaying a reflection of an element
trans-unit.target: 显示元素反射的方法

trans-unit.source: Method of displaying an element as a block while flowing it with text.
trans-unit.target: 将元素作为块显示的方法,同时将其与文本一起流动。

trans-unit.source: Method of displaying an inner or outer shadow effect to elements
trans-unit.target: 对元素显示内影或外影效果的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of displaying basic Vector Graphics features using the embed or object elements. Refers to the SVG 1.1 spec.
trans-unit.target: 使用嵌入或对象元素显示基本矢量图形特征的方法。参考SVG 1.1规范。

trans-unit.source: Method of displaying elements as tables, rows, and cells. Includes support for all display: table-* properties as well as display: inline-table
trans-unit.target: 将元素显示为表格，行和单元格的方法。包括对所有 display: table-* 属性以及 display: inline-table

trans-unit.source: Method of displaying fonts downloaded from websites
trans-unit.target: 显示从网站下载的字体的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of displaying only a part of an SVG image by defining a view ID or view box dimensions as the file's fragment identifier.
trans-unit.target: 通过定义视图ID或视图框尺寸作为文件的片段标识符,只显示SVG图像的一部分的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of displaying part of an element, using a selected image as a mask
trans-unit.target: 用选定的图像作为遮罩,显示元素的一部分的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of displaying text on Canvas elements
trans-unit.target: 在Canvas元素上显示文字的方法

trans-unit.source: Method of displaying text or images before or after the given element's contents using the ::before and ::after pseudo-elements. All browsers with support also support the attr() notation in the content property.
trans-unit.target: 使用:: before和:: after伪元素在给定元素的内容之前或之后显示文本或图像的方法。所有支持的浏览器还支持 content 属性中的 attr() 表示法。

trans-unit.source: Method of easily creating custom dialog boxes to display to the user with modal or non-modal options. Also includes a ::backdrop pseudo-element for behind the element.
trans-unit.target: 轻松创建自定义对话框以使用模式或非模式选项向用户显示的方法。还包括在元素后面的 ::backdrop 伪元素。

trans-unit.source: Method of easily dragging and dropping elements on a page, requiring minimal JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 在页面上轻松拖放元素的方法,只需要最少的JavaScript。

trans-unit.source: Method of easily manipulating classes on elements, using the DOMTokenList object.

trans-unit.source: Method of embedding images and other files in webpages as a string of text, generally using base64 encoding.
trans-unit.target: 在网页中嵌入图片和其他文件作为文本字符串的方法,一般使用base64编码。

trans-unit.target: 在DOM树之间建立和维护功能边界以及这些树如何在文档中彼此交互的方法，从而可以在DOM和CSS中更好地进行功能封装。

trans-unit.source: Method of establishing and maintaining functional boundaries between DOM trees and how these trees interact with each other within a document, thus enabling better functional encapsulation within the DOM.

trans-unit.target: 使用JavaScript生成动态3D图形的方法,通过硬件加速。

trans-unit.target: 使用JavaScript快速生成动态图形的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of including and reusing HTML documents in other HTML documents.
trans-unit.target: 在其他HTML文档中包含和重用HTML文档的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of indicating a progress state.
trans-unit.target: 表示进度状态的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of indicating the current level of a gauge.

trans-unit.source: Method of keeping an element in a fixed location regardless of scroll position
trans-unit.target: 无论滚动位置如何,都能将元素保持在固定位置的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of letting the browser pick the most appropriate CSS background image from a given set, primarily for high PPI screens.
trans-unit.target: 让浏览器从一组给定的CSS背景图片中挑选最合适的方法,主要用于高PPI的屏幕。

trans-unit.target: 使任何HTML元素可编辑的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of manipulating the user's browser's session history in JavaScript using history.pushState, history.replaceState and the popstate event.
trans-unit.target: 使用 history.pushState ， history.replaceState 和 popstate 事件在JavaScript中操纵用户浏览器的会话历史记录的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of optimizing animations by informing the browser which elements will change and what properties will change.
trans-unit.target: 通过告知浏览器哪些元素会发生变化,哪些属性会发生变化来优化动画的方法。

trans-unit.target: 跨域执行XMLHttpRequests的方法。

trans-unit.target: 将代码置于 "严格 "的操作环境中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of playing sound on webpages (without requiring a plug-in). Includes support for the following media properties: currentSrc, currentTime, paused, playbackRate, buffered, duration, played, seekable, ended, autoplay, loop, controls, volume & muted
trans-unit.target: 在网页上播放声音的方法（无需插件）。包括用于以下介质属性的支持： currentSrc ， currentTime 的， paused ， playbackRate ， buffered ， duration ， played ， seekable ， ended ， autoplay ， loop ， controls ， volume 和 muted

trans-unit.source: Method of playing videos on webpages (without requiring a plug-in). Includes support for the following media properties: currentSrc, currentTime, paused, playbackRate, buffered, duration, played, seekable, ended, autoplay, loop, controls, volume & muted
trans-unit.target: 在网页上播放视频的方法（无需插件）。包括用于以下介质属性的支持： currentSrc ， currentTime 的， paused ， playbackRate ， buffered ， duration ， played ， seekable ， ended ， autoplay ， loop ， controls ， volume 和 muted

trans-unit.source: Method of positioning elements in horizontal or vertical stacks. Support includes all properties prefixed with flex, as well as display: flex, display: inline-flex, align-content, align-items, align-self, justify-content and order.
trans-unit.target: 在水平或垂直堆栈中定位元素的方法。支持包括以 flex 为前缀的所有属性，以及 display: flex ， display: inline-flex ， align-content ， align-items ， align-self ， justify-content 和 order 。

trans-unit.source: Method of preventing text/element selection using CSS.
trans-unit.target: 使用CSS防止文本/元素选择的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of providing ways for people with disabilities to use dynamic web content and web applications.
trans-unit.target: 为残疾人提供使用动态网络内容和网络应用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of reading and writing files to a sandboxed file system.
trans-unit.target: 向沙盒文件系统读写文件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of reading the contents of a File or Blob object into memory
trans-unit.target: 将文件或Blob对象的内容读入内存的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of registering when, where and how the interface is touched, for devices with a touch screen. These DOM events are similar to mousedown, mousemove, etc.
trans-unit.target: 对于带有触摸屏的设备,记录界面被触摸的时间、地点和方式的方法。这些DOM事件类似于mousedown、mousemove等。

trans-unit.source: Method of running external site pages with reduced privileges (e.g. no JavaScript) in iframes.
trans-unit.target: 在iframe中以降低权限(如无JavaScript)运行外部网站页面的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of running scripts in the background, isolated from the web page
trans-unit.target: 在后台运行脚本的方法,与网页隔离。

trans-unit.source: Method of sending information from a page on one domain to a page on a different one (using postMessage)
trans-unit.target: 从一个域的页面向另一个域的页面发送信息的方法(使用postMessage)。

trans-unit.source: Method of setting a list of options for a user to select in a text field, while leaving the ability to enter a custom value.
trans-unit.target: 在文本字段中设置一个选项列表供用户选择的方法,同时保留输入自定义值的功能。

trans-unit.source: Method of setting a minimum or maximum width or height to an element.
trans-unit.target: 为元素设置最小或最大宽度或高度的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of setting placeholder text for text-like input fields, to suggest the expected inserted information.
trans-unit.target: 为类文本输入字段设置占位符文字的方法,以提示预期插入的信息。

trans-unit.source: Method of setting required fields and field types without requiring JavaScript. This includes preventing forms from being submitted when appropriate, the checkValidity() method as well as support for the :invalid, :valid, and :required CSS pseudo-classes.
trans-unit.target: 无需JavaScript即可设置必填字段和字段类型的方法。这包括防止在适当的时候提交表单， checkValidity() 方法以及对 :invalid ， :valid 和 :required CSS伪类的支持。

trans-unit.source: Method of setting the transparency level of an element
trans-unit.target: 设置元素的透明度等级的方法

trans-unit.source: Method of specifying and selecting between multiple audio tracks. Useful for providing audio descriptions, director's commentary, additional languages, alternative takes, etc.
trans-unit.target: 指定和选择多个音轨的方法。有助于提供音频描述、导演评论、额外的语言、替代镜头等。

trans-unit.source: Method of specifying and selecting between multiple video tracks. Useful for providing sign language tracks, burnt-in captions or subtitles, alternative camera angles, etc.
trans-unit.target: 指定和选择多个视频轨道的方法。有助于提供手语轨道、烧录字幕或字幕、替代的摄像机角度等。

trans-unit.source: Method of specifying how an object (image or video) should fit inside its box. object-fit options include "contain" (fit according to aspect ratio), "fill" (stretches object to fill) and "cover" (overflows box but maintains ratio), where object-position allows the object to be repositioned like background-image does.
trans-unit.target: object-fit选项包括 "con contain"(根据长宽比进行调整)、"fill"(拉伸对象以填充)和 "cover"(溢出盒子但保持比例),其中object-position允许对象像背景图像一样重新定位。

trans-unit.source: Method of specifying the scrolling behavior for a scrolling box, when scrolling happens due to navigation or CSSOM scrolling APIs.
trans-unit.target: 当由于导航或CSSOM滚动API而发生滚动时,指定滚动框的滚动行为的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of specifying whether or not an element's borders and padding should be included in size units
trans-unit.target: 指定元素的边框和padding是否应该包含在尺寸单位中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method of storing data client-side, allows SQLite database queries for access and manipulation
trans-unit.target: 客户端存储数据的方法,允许SQLite数据库查询访问和操作。

trans-unit.source: Method of storing data client-side, allows indexed database queries.
trans-unit.target: 客户端存储数据的方法,允许索引数据库查询。

trans-unit.source: Method of storing data locally like cookies, but for larger amounts of data (sessionStorage and localStorage, used to fall under HTML5).
trans-unit.target: 像Cookie一样在本地存储数据的方法,但对于较大的数据量(sessionStorage和localStorage,曾经属于HTML5)。

trans-unit.source: Method of testing whether or not a DOM element matches a given selector. Formerly known (and largely supported with prefix) as matchesSelector.
trans-unit.target: 测试一个DOM元素是否匹配给定选择器的方法。以前被称为(主要支持前缀)matchesSelector。

trans-unit.source: Method of transforming an element in the third dimension using the transform property. Includes support for the perspective property to set the perspective in z-space and the backface-visibility property to toggle display of the reverse side of a 3D-transformed element.
trans-unit.target: 使用 transform 属性在三维中转换元素的方法。包括对 perspective 属性的支持，该属性用于在z空间中设置透视图，而 backface-visibility 属性用于在3D转换后的元素的背面切换显示。

trans-unit.source: Method of transforming an element including rotating, scaling, etc. Includes support for transform as well as transform-origin properties.
trans-unit.target: 变换元素的方法，包括旋转，缩放等。包括对 transform 以及 transform-origin 属性的支持。

trans-unit.source: Method of using HTML5 Canvas as a background image. Not currently part of any specification.
trans-unit.target: 使用 HTML5 Canvas 作为背景图片的方法。目前不属于任何规范的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Method of using Photoshop-like effects on SVG objects including blurring and color manipulation.

trans-unit.target: 使用SVG图像作为CSS背景的方法

trans-unit.target: 使用CSS或foreignObject元素在HTML元素上使用SVG变换、过滤器等方法。

trans-unit.target: 使用网格概念布置内容的方法，为作者提供了一种机制，该机制使用一组可预测的大小调整行为将用于布局的可用空间划分为列和行。包括对所有 grid-* 属性和 fr 单位的支持。

trans-unit.target: 使用多个图像作为背景的方法

trans-unit.source: Method of using small symbols next to each glyph to emphasize a run of text, commonly used in East Asian languages. The text-emphasis-position property, which inherits separately, allows setting the emphasis marks' position with respect to the text.
trans-unit.target: 在每个字形旁边使用小符号来强调一段文字的方法，通常在东亚语言中使用。该 text-emphasis 的简写，其 text-emphasis-style 和 text-emphasis-color longhands，可以用来标记应用于文本。分别继承的 text-emphasis-position 属性允许设置强调标记相对于文本的位置。

trans-unit.source: Method that enables applications to take advantage of persistent background processing, including hooks to enable bootstrapping of web applications while offline.

trans-unit.source: Not every computer or smartphone could run WebVR appication. For smartphones, you need a gyroscope and for computers must be VR-ready also the needed sotfware (Oculus client or (Steam VR and VivePort)) and drivers must been installed on the computer. In this situations, you've the best experiance to use WebVR applications.
trans-unit.target: 并非每台电脑或智能手机都能运行WebVR应用。对于智能手机来说,你需要一个陀螺仪,而对于电脑来说,必须要有VR功能,同时还需要在电脑上安装所需的软件(Oculus客户端或(Steam VR和VivePort))和驱动程序。在这种情况下,你有最好的体验来使用WebVR应用程序。

trans-unit.target: 旧版本的Chrome浏览器使用了ChaCha20-Poly1305密码套件的非标准码点。

trans-unit.source: Old versions of WebKit-based desktop browsers (Chrome<27, Safari<6) suffer from a bug where if -webkit-text-size-adjust is explicitly set to none, instead of ignoring the property, the browsers will prevent the user from zooming in or out on the webpage.
trans-unit.target: 基于WebKit的旧版桌面浏览器（Chrome <27，Safari <6）存在一个错误，即如果 -webkit-text-size-adjust 显式设置为 none ，则该浏览器将阻止用户执行以下操作：放大或缩小网页。

trans-unit.source: Older (presto-based) versions of the Opera browser have also supported the same effect using the proprietary -o-ellipsis-lastline; value for text-overflow.
trans-unit.target: 较旧的（基于Presto的）Opera浏览器版本也使用专有的 -o-ellipsis-lastline; 支持相同的效果。 text-overflow 值。

trans-unit.source: Older Chromium browsers did not support the JS API.
Older Edge versions did not support progressive sources.
Older browser versions did not support all codecs.
Older iOS versions and Android 4.0.4 claim support, but implementation is too buggy to be useful.
trans-unit.target: 旧的iOS版本和Android 4.0.4宣称支持,但实现起来太过bug,没有用。

trans-unit.source: Older versions of Chrome and Opera on Windows have only millisecond precision. The fractional part is always near the very start or the very end of a millisecond. (issue #158234).
trans-unit.target: Windows上的旧版本的Chrome和Opera仅具有毫秒级的精度。小数部分始终在毫秒的开始或结尾附近。（问题＃158234）。

trans-unit.source: Older versions of Chrome and Safari do not support feConvolveMatrix and their lighting implementation is incomplete.
trans-unit.target: 旧版本的Chrome和Safari不支持feConvolveMatrix,它们的光照实现不完整。

trans-unit.source: Older versions of IE11 have only partial support of the spec, though it's much better with the latest update.
trans-unit.target: 较旧版本的IE11仅部分支持该规范，尽管最新版本要好得多。

trans-unit.source: Older versions of iOS did not support video as a source for the canvas drawImage(), though it does appear to work as of iOS 8 test case
trans-unit.target: 较旧的iOS版本不支持将视频作为canvas drawImage() 的源，尽管它似乎在iOS 8 测试用例中也可以使用

trans-unit.source: Older webkit browsers also support the unofficial intrinsic value which acts the same as max-content.
trans-unit.target: 较早的Webkit浏览器还支持与 max-content 相同的非官方 intrinsic 价值。

trans-unit.source: On Safari in macOS before 10.14.4 and iOS before 12.2, some authentication flows with a cross-site identity provider might fail when SameSite=Lax is used. See the explanation and a workaround.
On Safari before 12.1.1 and iOS before 12.3, manually visiting a redirection link to a cross-site omits Lax cookies from the cross-site request. See the bug.
On Mac OS X, unless Full Keyboard Access is enabled, <a> elements are not keyboard-focusable, even if they have tabindex="0".
trans-unit.target: 在Mac OS X上，除非启用了“完全键盘访问”，否则 <a> 元素即使在具有 tabindex="0" 情况下也不是键盘焦点。

trans-unit.source: On Windows, files that do not apply are hidden. On OSX they are grayed out and disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上,不适用的文件会被隐藏。在OSX上,它们被灰化并被禁用。

trans-unit.source: On iOS Safari and Chrome for Android, 100vw 100vh are sized to the 'largest possible viewport' where they may be larger than <html> 100% being the 'smallest possible viewport', all during the user's scrolling. On Safari for iPad with the sidebar on, the 'largest possible viewport' may be when the content is scrolled until it fills all the area beneath the blurred sidebar.
trans-unit.target: 在iOS Safari和适用于Android的Chrome上，将 100vw 100vh 设置为“最大可能的视口”，在此范围内，它们可能大于 <html> 100% 是“最大可能的视口”，所有这些都在用户滚动时进行。在侧边栏处于打开状态的iPad版Safari上，“最大可能的视口”可能是滚动内容直到其填充到模糊的侧边栏下方的所有区域时。

trans-unit.source: On iOS the ended event is not fired when the screen is off or the browser is in the background (meaning that e.g. src cannot be changed).
trans-unit.target: 在iOS上，当屏幕关闭或浏览器处于后台时，不会触发 ended 事件（例如，无法更改 src ）。

trans-unit.source: On mobile devices, the text-size-adjust CSS property allows Web authors to control if and how the text-inflating algorithm is applied to the textual content of the element it is applied to.
trans-unit.target: 在移动设备上,文本大小调整CSS属性允许Web作者控制是否以及如何将文本膨胀算法应用到它所应用的元素的文本内容上。

trans-unit.target: 仅在Chrome和Opera的ServiceWorkers中可用。

trans-unit.source: Only basic read support.
trans-unit.target: 只支持基本的阅读。

trans-unit.source: Only cachable resources can be preloaded. This includes the following as values: script, style, image, video, audio, track, fetch, and font (note font/collection is not supported).
trans-unit.target: 只能预加载可缓存的资源。这包括以下 as 值：脚本，样式，图片，视频，音频，跟踪，获取和字体（注意字体/不支持集合）。

trans-unit.source: Only fires copy event on a valid selection and only cut and paste in focused editable fields.
trans-unit.target: 仅在有效选择上触发 copy 事件，并且仅 cut 并 paste 到集中的可编辑字段中。

trans-unit.source: Only in Opera Mobile
trans-unit.target: 仅在Opera Mobile中

trans-unit.source: Only matches the very first character. The spec says that surrounding punctuation should also match.
trans-unit.target: 只匹配第一个字符。规范规定,周围的标点符号也应该匹配。

trans-unit.source: Only recognized when NOT in strict mode
trans-unit.target: 只有在非严格模式下才能识别

trans-unit.source: Only recognizes the deprecated :first-letter pseudo-class, not the ::first-letter pseudo-element.
trans-unit.target: 只识别被废弃的:首字母伪类,不识别::首字母伪元素。

trans-unit.source: Only replaces WebkitCSSMatrix and not SVGMatrix
trans-unit.target: 仅替换 WebkitCSSMatrix 而不替换 SVGMatrix

trans-unit.source: Only select elements containing specified content. For example, a:has(>img) selects all <a> elements that contain an <img> child.
trans-unit.target: 仅选择包含指定内容的元素。例如， a:has(>img) 选择所有包含 <img> 子元素的 <a> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Only supported in Android WebViews in apps that target Android Pie, due to this issue
Only supported in IE11 in later versions of Windows 10 (creators update).
trans-unit.target: 只有在Windows 10以后版本的IE11中才支持(创作者更新)。

trans-unit.source: Only supported in IE6 and IE7 on elements with a display of "inline" by default. Alternative properties are available to provide complete cross-browser support.
trans-unit.target: IE6和IE7仅在默认情况下显示为“内联”的元素上受支持。可以使用其他属性来提供完整的跨浏览器支持。

Partial support in Safari refers to being limited to macOS 11 Big Sur and later.

trans-unit.source: Partial support in Safari refers to support for object-fit but not object-position.
trans-unit.target: Safari中的部分支持是指对 object-fit 支持，而不是对 object-position 。

trans-unit.source: Partial support in Safari, iOS Safari and Android Browser refers to missing "inset", blur radius value, and multiple shadow support.

trans-unit.source: Partial support in iOS Safari and older Safari versions refers to failing to support tiling or the background-position property.

trans-unit.source: Partial support refers to basic support of element.animate()

Partial support refers to not supporting the break-before, break-after, break-inside properties. WebKit- and Blink-based browsers do have equivalent support for the non-standard -webkit-column-break-* properties to accomplish the same result (but only the auto and always values). Firefox does not support break-* but does support the page-break-* properties to accomplish the same result.

trans-unit.source: Partial support refers to not supporting the break-before, break-after, and break-inside properties. WebKit- and Blink-based browsers do have equivalent support for the non-standard -webkit-column-break-* properties to accomplish the same result (but only the auto and always values). Firefox does not support break-* but does support the now-obsolete page-break-* properties in the paging (printing) context.

trans-unit.source: Safari & iOS Safari (both 6 and 7) does not support viewport units (vw, vh, etc) in calc().
trans-unit.target: Safari和iOS Safari（版本6和7）不支持 calc() 中的视口单位（ vw ， vh 等）。

trans-unit.source: Safari & iOS Safari (both 6 and 7) does not support viewport units for border widths, column gaps, transform values, box shadows or in calc().
trans-unit.target: Safari和iOS Safari（版本6和7）不支持视口单位的边框宽度，列间距，变换值，框阴影或 calc() 。

trans-unit.source: Safari (>= 5.1) on Windows has a bug in multiple file uploads when used together with FormData to do binary uploads; each file will be reported as 0 bytes. Single file selection, however, works fine.
trans-unit.target: Windows上的Safari（> = 5.1）与FormData一起进行二进制上传时，在多个文件上传中存在一个错误；每个文件将报告为0字节。但是，选择单个文件效果很好。

trans-unit.source: Safari (OS X and iOS) and Chrome do not support background-size: 100% <height>px; in combination with SVG images, it leaves them at the original size while other browsers stretch the vector image correctly while leaving the height at the specified number of pixels.
trans-unit.target: Safari（OS X和iOS）和Chrome浏览器不支持背景尺寸：100％<height> px；与SVG图像结合使用时，它将使它们保持原始大小，而其他浏览器会正确拉伸矢量图像，同时使高度保持指定的像素数。

trans-unit.source: Safari 10 and below can return undefined on properties of dataset in some cases. (See bug).
trans-unit.target: 某些情况下，Safari 10及更低版本的Safari可能会返回 undefined 的 dataset 属性。（请参见错误）。

trans-unit.source: Safari 10 and below uses min/max width/height declarations for actually rendering the size of flex items, but it ignores those values when calculating how many items should be on a single line of a multi-line flex container. Instead, it simply uses the item's flex-basis value, or its width if the flex basis is set to auto. see bug. Fixed in all versions > 10.
trans-unit.target: Safari 10及以下版本使用min / max width / height声明来实际渲染flex项目的大小，但是在计算多行flex容器的一行中应该有多少项目时，它会忽略这些值。相反，它仅使用项目的flex-basis值，或者将flex基础设置为auto时使用其宽度。看到错误。已在所有版本> 10中修复。

trans-unit.source: Safari 11 does not support CSS transitions on the flex-basis property.
trans-unit.target: Safari 11 在 flex-basis 属性上不支持 CSS过渡。

trans-unit.source: Safari 11.1 – 12 on iOS can’t sendBeacons to unvisited origins. Fixed in iOS 13.
Safari 11.1 – 12.2 on macOS and iOS have a bug with sendBeacon in a pagehide event listener. Fixed in iOS 12.3.
Safari 12 sometimes garbage collects the cached TemplateStrings used by Tagged Template Literals
Safari 14 and below throw an error when the base parameter is undefined
Safari 3.1 has a caching bug. If the class of an element changes it won't be available for getElementsByClassName.
trans-unit.target: Safari 3.1有一个缓存错误。如果一个元素的类发生了变化,它将无法被 getElementsByClassName 使用。

trans-unit.source: Safari 5 & 6 seem to not provide geolocation data when using a wired connection.
trans-unit.target: 使用有线连接时， Safari 5和6似乎不提供地理位置数据。

trans-unit.source: Safari 5-8 is known to render columns less evenly than other browsers
trans-unit.target: 已知Safari 5-8可以比其他浏览器更不均匀地显示列

trans-unit.source: Safari 5-8 is known to render columns less evenly than other browsers.
Safari 5.1 and Android browsers do not support the adjacent selector if the adjacent element is a "nav" element.
trans-unit.target: 如果相邻元素是 "导航 "元素,Safari 5.1和Android浏览器不支持相邻选择器。

trans-unit.source: Safari 5.1 does not support Float64Array
trans-unit.target: Safari 5.1不支持 Float64Array

trans-unit.source: Safari 5.1 requires a color to be defined for the shadow.
trans-unit.target: Safari 5.1要求为阴影定义一个颜色。

trans-unit.source: Safari 5.1-10+ does not work as expected with min-height. See a testcase See bug.
Safari 5.1-10+ does not work as expected with min-heightsee testcasesee bug
trans-unit.target: Safari 5.1-10 +不能与 min-height 一起正常工作，请参见测试用例，请参见错误

trans-unit.source: Safari 5.1.17 has a bug in when using an element with display:table, with padding and width. It seems to force the use of the border-box model instead of the content-box model. Chrome 21.0 however works correctly, making it difficult to resolve with CSS alone.
trans-unit.target: Safari 5.1.17 在使用带有 display:table 的元素时出现了一个 bug,并带有 padding 和 width。它似乎强制使用border-box模型而不是content-box模型。然而,Chrome 21.0却能正常工作,这使得仅用CSS很难解决。

trans-unit.source: Safari 6, iOS 6 and Android 2.3 default browser don't work with a 0px value for "blur-radius".
trans-unit.target: Safari 6、iOS 6和Android 2.3的默认浏览器无法使用 "模糊半径 "的0px值。

trans-unit.source: Safari 6.0.x does not use box-sizing on elements with display: table;
trans-unit.target: Safari 6.0.x不对带有display:table的元素使用方框大小。

trans-unit.source: Safari 6.1 and earlier did not apply border-radius correctly to image borders: https://stackoverflow.com/q/17202128
trans-unit.target: Safari 6.1和更早版本未将 border-radius 正确应用于图像边界：https://stackoverflow.com/q/17202128

trans-unit.source: Safari 6.2 has the same partial support as Safari 7.1.
trans-unit.target: Safari 6.2的部分支持与Safari 7.1相同。

trans-unit.source: Safari 7.0 supports only the event listener on window, and not on document.body
trans-unit.target: Safari 7.0仅在 window 上支持事件监听器，而在 document.body 上不支持

trans-unit.source: Safari 8 has a bug with bottom-positioned values background-attachment: fixed;
trans-unit.target: Safari 8 有一个错误，该错误的 background-attachment: fixed; 值固定在底部。

trans-unit.source: Safari 8+ supports -webkit-text-decoration-skip with values none and skip (other values behave like none or skip)
trans-unit.target: Safari 8+支持 -webkit-text-decoration-skip ，其值为 none 和 skip （其他值的行为类似于 none 或 skip ）

trans-unit.source: Safari 9 - 13 still require a prefix for the related backface-visibility property. WebKit Bug 170983 requests prefix removal.
Safari 9 doesn't properly shorten the first line of text. Applying margin-top: 1em to the letter fixes this problem.
trans-unit.target: Safari 9不能正确缩短文本的第一行。将 margin-top: 1em 应用于字母可解决此问题。

trans-unit.source: Safari 9 has support for "pinned tab" SVG icons, but this requires an unofficial rel="mask-icon" to be set and only works for all-black icons on Pinned Tabs.
trans-unit.target: Safari 9支持“ 固定选项卡 ” SVG图标，但这需要设置非官方的 rel="mask-icon" ，并且仅适用于固定选项卡上的全黑图标。

trans-unit.source: Safari 9+ has support for "pinned tab" SVG icons, but this requires an unofficial rel="mask-icon" to be set and only works for all-black icons on Pinned Tabs.
Safari 9, 10, 11, & 12 are reported to still require a prefix for the related backface-visibility property.
trans-unit.target: 据报道，Safari 9、10、11和12仍需要相关 backface-visibility 属性的前缀。

trans-unit.source: Safari has a bug where image-rendering: pixelated is not supported for WebGL contexts.

trans-unit.source: Safari and Chrome give incorrect results for elements that have the nonstandard zoom CSS property applied to them. See WebKit bug #77998.
trans-unit.target: 对于已应用非标准 zoom CSS属性的元素，Safari和Chrome给出的结果不正确。请参阅WebKit错误＃77998。

trans-unit.source: Safari and Firefox only supports the allow attribute on iframes.
Safari and iOS Safari 8 (maybe earlier too) have a bug with currentColor in :after/:before pseudo-content
trans-unit.target: Safari和iOS Safari 8（也许也更早）在伪内容：after /：before中存在currentColor的错误

trans-unit.source: Safari blocks access to keyboard events in fullscreen mode (as a security measure).
trans-unit.target: Safari 阻止在全屏模式下访问键盘事件(作为一项安全措施)。

trans-unit.source: Safari browsers support the pattern attribute but will still allow forms to be submitted if the pattern is incorrect. See the form validation data for details.
trans-unit.target: Safari浏览器支持 pattern 属性，但如果模式不正确，仍将允许提交表单。有关详细信息，请参见表单验证数据。

trans-unit.source: Safari claims to support certain font-feature-settings it actually does not. This JS module helps to provide accurate support for this.
trans-unit.target: Safari声称实际上不支持某些字体功能设置。该JS模块有助于为此提供准确的支持。

trans-unit.source: Safari does not support newlines for placeholder text in <textarea> elements
Safari does not yet support intrinsic and extrinsic sizing with grid properties such as grid-template-rows
trans-unit.target: Safari尚不支持使用网格属性（例如 grid-template-rows )进行内部和外部大小调整

trans-unit.source: Safari does not yet support usage with CSS Grid Layout properties such as grid-template-rows.
trans-unit.target: Safari尚不支持通过CSS Grid Layout属性（例如 grid-template-rows )使用。

trans-unit.source: Safari doesn't implement the DragEvent interface. It adds a dataTransfer property to MouseEvent instead. See WebKit bug #103423.
trans-unit.target: Safari没有实现 DragEvent 接口。而是将 dataTransfer 属性添加到 MouseEvent 。请参阅WebKit错误＃103423。

trans-unit.source: Safari doesn't support a list of origins or a wildcard.
Safari doesn't support stacking, meaning only one element can be set to full screen. webkitRequestFullScreen() is ignored for other elements and no error event is dispatched.
trans-unit.target: Safari不支持堆叠，这意味着只能将一个元素设置为全屏显示。其他元素将忽略 webkitRequestFullScreen() ，并且不会调度任何错误事件。

trans-unit.source: Safari has a serious issue with blobs that are of the type application/octet-stream
trans-unit.target: Safari 对于类型为 application/octet-stream 的 Blob 有严重的问题

trans-unit.source: Safari has window.AbortController defined in the DOM but it's just a stub, it does not abort requests at all. The same issue also affects Chrome on IOS and Firefox on IOS because they use the same WebKit rendering engine as Safari.
Safari ignores the off value for username, email and password fields
trans-unit.target: Safari忽略用户名，电子邮件和密码字段的 off 值

trans-unit.source: Safari implementation bug
trans-unit.target: Safari实施错误

trans-unit.source: Safari implementation bug for unprefixed `appearance`
Safari implementation is incomplete. Does not allow applying web fonts to the initial letter.
trans-unit.target: Safari实施不完整。不允许将网络字体应用到首字母。

trans-unit.source: Safari on iOS 5.1 does not support min-width on table elements.
trans-unit.target: iOS 5.1上的Safari不支持表格元素的 min-width 。

trans-unit.source: Safari on iOS won’t sendBeacons from pages that quickly redirect to another location.
Safari on iOS does not support A2HS in WebViews like Chrome and Firefox.

Safari on iOS doesn't implement the spec correctly, because alpha is arbitrary instead of relative to true north. Safari instead offers webkitCompassHeading`, which has the opposite sign to alpha and is also relative to magnetic north instead of true north. (see details)
trans-unit.target: iOS上的Safari无法正确实现规范，因为alpha是任意的，而不是相对于真正的北方。Safari而是提供了webkitCompassHeading`，它的符号与alpha相反，并且也相对于磁北而非真北。（查看详细信息）

trans-unit.source: Selectors Level 3 only allowed :not() pseudo-class to accept a single simple selector, which the element must not match any of. Thus, :not(a, .b, [c]) or :not(a.b[c]) did not work. Selectors Level 4 allows :not() to accept a list of selectors. Thus, :not(a):not(.b):not([c]) can instead be written as :not(a, .b, [c]) and :not(a.b[c]) works as intended.
Selectors Level 4 § The Mutability Pseudo-classes: :read-only and :read-write
trans-unit.target: 选择器级别4§可变性伪类：：read-only和：read-write

trans-unit.source: Selectors Level 4 allows the :not() pseudo-class to accept a list of selectors, which the element must not match any of. Selectors Level 3 only allowed :not() to accept a single simple selector. Thus, :not(a):not(.b):not([c]) can instead be written as :not(a, .b, [c])
trans-unit.target: 选择器级别4允许 :not() 伪类接受选择器列表，该选择器不得与任何元素匹配。选择器级别3仅允许 :not() 接受单个简单选择器。因此， :not(a):not(.b):not([c]) 可以改写为 :not(a, .b, [c])
